sec.p: For sensory analysis, meats were removed from deep freeze 24 h prior to use, thawed at + 4 °C and grilled. Panelists assessed the odor, tenderness, taste, juiciness, appearance and overall acceptability for grilled meat samples scoring from 1 to 5. The assessors were selected and trained according to the international standards [ 23]. The sensory evaluation was performed according to a standardized sensory descriptive method [ 24].
